example.name: args 2, 3
example.text: They 're saying it 's a variant that-1 was reprogrammed *-1 help hackers gain control over the accounts to obtain financial and other personal info .

example.name: uh oh...
example.text: I recently reprogrammed it with your custom thing and the lights keep flashing and the mod won't work.

example.name: voting machine terror
example.text: We could have reprogrammed it to steal votes, but that's been done before, and Pac-Man is more fun!
